title: How do you effectively manage your time during ESA ? Also, are watches allowed (analog ones only)?

comments.body:
I have used Gshock Digital+ analog , no issues unless it's a smart watch.

I made a target for myself to complete 3  out of 5  questions in  1.5  -1: 45hours  and leave last 15-20 minutes for extra points or calculation check
Thanks. For first year which subject is the lengthiest?

This largely depends on the type of papers being set. For my batch the Math papers were by far the lengthiest, followed by mechanical. But again this varies from batch to batch but you'll definitely find math lengthy on most occasions
